name: General Medicine
description: Diagnosis and treatment of common and chronic illnesses.

name: Pediatrics
description: Specialized medical care for infants, children, and adolescents.

name: Obstetrics & Gynecology (OB/GYN)
description: Maternal care, childbirth, and female reproductive health.

name: Surgery
description: Major and minor surgical operations.

name: Emergency (A&E)
description: 24/7 urgent care for accidents and critical illnesses.

name: Laboratory
description: Blood tests, microbiology, chemistry, and diagnostic laboratories.

name: Radiology
description: Medical imaging including X-ray, CT scan, MRI, and ultrasound.

name: Ophthalmology
description: Eye examinations, treatments, and surgeries.

name: ENT
description: Ear, nose, throat, and head & neck medical services.

name: Dental Clinic
description: Oral care, tooth extraction, cleaning, and dental surgery.

name: Pharmacy
description: Dispensing medication and pharmaceutical counseling.

name: Physiotherapy
description: Rehabilitation, mobility recovery, and pain management.

name: Cardiology
description: Heart and cardiovascular system medical services.

name: Dermatology
description: Skin, hair, and nail treatments.

name: Oncology
description: Cancer diagnosis, therapy, and long-term care.

name: Neurology
description: Brain, nerve, and spinal cord specialties.

name: Psychiatry
description: Mental health evaluation, counseling, and treatment.

name: Urology
description: Urinary tract and male reproductive health.

name: Nephrology
description: Kidney disease management and treatment.

name: Orthopedics
description: Bone, joint, muscle, and skeletal system care.

name: Finance Department
description: Billing, payment processing, insurance, and financial records management.
